metadata.title: CVE-2023-44444 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
[GIMP PSP File Parsing Off-By-One Remote Code Execution Vulnerability]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44444` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.10.34-1ubuntu0.23.04.1
gimp-data - 2.10.34-1ubuntu0.23.04.1
libgimp2.0 - 2.10.34-1ubuntu0.23.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.10.34-1ubuntu0.23.04.1').
